item.title: Waiting for a ManualResetEventSlim to be set asynchronously
item.description: ManualResetEventSlim represents a thread synchronization event that, when signaled, must be reset manually. This is a common synchronization primitive. However, it doesn't expose a method to wait asynchronously.
